<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the forecast fog value. A value of 0 means no fog, 1 means maximum fog. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fogForecast''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_level = [[fogForecast]];</code>

</value></part><part><name> mp </name>=<value> This command returns the local forcast fog value. Each client and the server can have differing values. </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[fogParams]], [[fog]], [[setFog]], [[nextWeatherChange]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
